settings.description: Settings to control the behaviour of the canvas.

allowed_save_file_formats.description: File formats that Neuro is allowed to save in.

canvas_size.description: Canvas size on startup. Setting either unit to 0 will prompt Neuro to input her decision on that dimension.

permisssions.description: Permissions that dictate what Neuro can do.

layer.description: Whether to grant access to layers.

misc.description: Whether to grant access to various miscellaneous actions not covered by the other permissions.

shapes.description: Whether to allow her to draw with shape presets (such as circles, triangles, etc...)

colour.description: Whether to allow her to change the colour of her brush.
